title: Chris Hayes | Rich Eisen
description:
Chris Hayes talks about bringing the Green New Deal to a town hall with Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Tucker Carlson's odd attempt to insult him and why he finds Fox News so unnerving. Plus, he talks to Late Night's Henry Melcher on his way back to his MSNBC studio in 30 Rock.

Then, Rich Eisen talks about covering 15 years of the NFL Draft, Tom Brady offering to help him train for Run Rich Run and his intimidating run-in with Bill Belichick. He also takes a few more questions from Late Night's Kevin Miller backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
